data.title: UK-Ireland film cinema release dates: latest updates for 2024
data.meta_description: Bookmark this page for the latest updates in the territory.
data.text:
Screen is listing the 2024 release dates for films in the UK and Ireland in the calendar below.

For distributors who wish to add/amend a date on the calendar, please get in touch with Screen here. Screen is also running a calendar for festival and market dates throughout 2024 here.

August

August 23

The Goldman Case (MetFilm), Blink Twice (Warner Bros), The Crow (EFD), The Mountain Within Me (Dogwoof), Kneecap (Curzon), Between The Temples (Sony), Clandestina (ICA), Cuckoo (Universal), The Italian Job (Paramount), The Amazing Spider-Man (Sony), Noah’s Ark (Miracle/Dazzler)

August 30

The Amazing Spider-Man 2 (Sony), The Crime Is Mine (Parkland), Touch (Universal), They Listen (Sony), Sing Sing (Black Bear)

August 31

Andre Rieu’s 2024 Maastricht Concert: Power Of Love (Piece Of Magic)

September

September 4

The Whip (Workbus)

September 6

Beetlejuice Beetlejuice (Warner Bros), Spider-Man Homecoming (Sony), Starve Acre (BFI)

September 10

Mozart’s The Marriage Of Figaro (Trafalgar)

September 13

September 18

September 27
